short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a secure password using the browser's crypto RNG.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generates a secure password using the browser's crypto RNG and a non-ambiguous character set. The password has an entropy of ~190 bits. For an easier to remember passphrase try tinyurl.com/yd2e2f4y

The author is one of the #MillionsMissing. If you find this software useful, please consider donating to the Open Medicine Foundation www.OMF.ngo for much needed research. Thank you.
